summary: This document is an authorization form from Deutsche Bank for asset movement related to non-retirement accounts, specifically involving transactions from an account associated with Epstein. It outlines the procedures for transferring funds and securities, as well as the responsibilities of the undersigned in relation to these transactions.

persons.name: Epstein
persons.context: Epstein is referenced as the account holder for the Deutsche Bank account involved in the asset movement authorization.

keyFacts: The document is an authorization for asset movement from a Deutsche Bank account associated with Epstein.
It specifies procedures for transferring funds and securities.
The undersigned acknowledges responsibility for the accuracy of the information provided.
The document includes disclaimers regarding the risk of loss from transmission methods.
There is a mention of Deutsche Bank's right to refuse execution of instructions if they suspect they are not authorized.
